concept.title: Directory
concept.shortdesc: The Directory origin reads data from files in a directory. Use the Directory origin to read text, JSON, delimited, and XML files. You can also use Directory to read files generated by other pipelines.

conbody.p: DirectoryovervieworiginsDirectoryDirectory reads the files in a directory with names that match a user-defined pattern. It can optionally begin processing with a specific file name. Then, it reads files with similar names in naturally ascending order. After processing a file, Directory can keep, archive, or delete the file.
